long_description: Able to withstand the fiercest of storms is this tunnel-tested, wind-resistant travel umbrella that has been proven to defy wind stress. WindPro(R) system features an aerodynamically vented canopy for protection in extremely windy and rainy conditions. Heavy-duty iron shaft and steel + FRP ribs are built to resist wind forces. The 43-inch canopy closes in three sections to a compact 12 inches. Cushioned handle is comfortable and easy to grip in wet weather. Reliable push button open/close mechanism responds quickly. Carry strap and umbrella cover with a carabiner clip included.
short_description: Able to withstand the fiercest of storms is this tunnel-tested, wind-resistant travel umbrella that has been proven to defy wind stress.
